product_name: Nokian Hakkapeliitta W240 Studded Tire - 700 x 40
long_description: Boasting tenacious grip, the Nokian Hakkapeliitta W240 studded tires is handmade in Finland and offers excellent all-around winter riding performance for your 700c wheels.
